programs.title: Strength
programs.description: Experience the benefits of our gym facilities for 1 month. Access state-of-the-art equipment, join exciting fitness classes, and kickstart your fitness journey. Stay motivated and achieve your goals with our supportive community.
programs.details: Ideal for those looking to try out our gym and experience the benefits for a short duration. Flexible membership options available after the trial period.

programs.title: Physical Fitness
programs.description: Commit to your fitness goals with a 3-month membership. Enjoy unlimited access to our gym facilities, including personalized workout plans and expert guidance. Elevate your fitness routine and witness positive transformations.
programs.details: Perfect for those who want a longer commitment with additional personalized support for their fitness journey. Access to nutritional guidance and diet planning for a holistic approach.

programs.title: Fat Lose
programs.description: Embark on a fitness journey with our 6-month membership. Benefit from extended access to top-notch gym amenities, wellness programs, and exclusive member events. Make a lasting commitment to a healthier, happier you.
programs.details: For those seeking a more extended commitment with added wellness programs and exclusive events. Complimentary fitness assessments and progress tracking.

programs.title: Weight Gain
programs.description: Transform your lifestyle with our 1-year membership. Enjoy uninterrupted access to our gym, receive personalized training plans, and become part of a thriving fitness community. Invest in your well-being for a year of positive change.
programs.details: A comprehensive package for a year-long commitment to health and fitness with personalized support. Exclusive member-only events and discounts on additional services.
